solution_line_template: Aston had torn and has now fixed a total of {total_pages_found} pages on the floor / {pages_per_comic} pages per comic = <<{total_pages_found}/{pages_per_comic}={fixed_comics}>>{fixed_comics} comics.

Adding this to the comics that were never torn means there are {fixed_comics} fixed comics + {untorn_comics} untorn comics = <<{fixed_comics}+{untorn_comics}={total_comics_in_box}>>{total_comics_in_box} comics in the box of comics.
